Admin.serverlist: Give the list of servers where the bot is on (only for bot owner)
Admin.leaveserver: Leave a server with its id given as argument (only for bot owner)
Admin.addrole: Add roles allowed to use the bot database system
Admin.removerole: Remove roles allowed to use the bot database system
Admin.addchannel: Add channel where the bot will create artwork threads
Admin.removechannel: Remove channel where the bot creates artwork threads
Admin.makeinvite: Generate invite link for current server
Admin.listmembers: Make a list of all discord members for a given guild

OC Methods.ocadd: Add OC to the database with respect to user and guild id
OC Methods.ocdelete: Delete an oc from the database
OC Methods.ocmodify: Modify OC in the database with respect to user id
OC Methods.oclist: List all oc of an artist for the current server
OC Methods.ocinfo: Gives the information sheet of an given OC
OC Methods.ocrandom: Send the description of a randomly selected OC

Suggestions.suggest: Make a suggestion to the developer

Misc.botserver: Get an invitation to our support server!
